survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in electric scooter sharing services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Allow single selection; consider randomizing options to reduce bias.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when choosing a scooter sharing service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select; limit to 3 selections.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when choosing a scooter sharing service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current pricing of electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current pricing of electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: How easy is it to find available scooters when you need them?
questions.client_notes: Another Likert scale question; maintain same scale orientation as Q4.

script.question_text: How easy is it to find available scooters when you need them?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to filter for follow-up if needed.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe your safety concerns:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific concerns; mobile users may prefer voice input.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe your safety concerns:

questions.question_text: How would you rate the maintenance condition of the scooters you've used?
questions.client_notes: Another scaled question; maintains consistency with previous scales.

script.question_text: How would you rate the maintenance condition of the scooters you've used?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture innovative ideas; set character limit to 500.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS-style question; useful for benchmarking.

script.question_text: Would you recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
